Nirmit is a fourth-generation lawyer. He is recognized by his peers and industry for his sharp skills in navigating the complex world of Land and Revenue laws. His expertise covers traditional property transactions and the present-day corporate advisory in the commercial real estate. His expertise is reflected in drafting water tight- Commercial Leases, Joint Real Estate Development Agreements and advising and handling step by step processes involved in conveyance of large Real Estate Projects.

He appears regularly in the District Court, Revenue Courts as well as High Courts and the Supreme Court of India. Hailing from a family of Advocates, he is imbibed with the traditions of the profession, integrity and sound ethical practices.

He holds a bachelors’ degree in Law from Symbiosis Law School, Pune. He is registered to practice with the Bar Council of Uttar Pradesh.
